entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
